1. Do you (still) think the duplicative #USDA #catfish inspection program is a good idea?
2. The unnecessary #USDA #catfish inspection program could harm American businesses. What’s the real cost of this program?
3. Are you aware the Government Accountability Office said, “Responsibility for inspecting #catfish should not be assigned to USDA?”
4. The FDA already regulates #catfish. Why spend millions in taxpayer dollars to have the #USDA do the very same job? #WastefulSpending
5. Did you know American Ag groups think the duplicative #catfish prog is “not a sound basis on which to form public policy on food safety?”
6. @WSJ calls duplicative #USDA #catfish program a “case study in nonsensical regulation.” http://ow.ly/bGAW6  Does that make sense to you?
7. A former FDA food safety czar, called #USDA #catfish program “everything that’s wrong about the food safety system.” Disagree?
8. The Senate fried the duplicative USDA #catfish program with bipartisan support. Can House waste-cutters do the same?
9. The #USDA calls #catfish a low-risk product. Are there any other low-risk products we should spend tens of millions in taxpayer $ on?
